title: Print, "Plate in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower right: D. Marot invente et Exc. auec preuille des. Etats generaux des province Unie
dimensions:
Sheet: 23.5 x 35 cm (9 1/4 x 13 3/4 in.)
Platemark: 20.3 x 27.3 cm (8 in. x 10 3/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Trompe l’oeil painted ceiling of winged figures flying in the sky, more figures on clouds, one blowing wind; other figures seen in niches between columns around painted sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Plate in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-41.
